description: "That's why... I whispered 'goodbye' so he wouldn't hear." The protagonist, retrying his university entrance exams, reunites with his former first love. A naughty, springtime love story—also involving a hot, muscular tutor—is about to begin!

name: SoulTrigger
description: An urban fantasy turn-based RPG where you analyze monsters' patterns and weaknesses to progress through battles.

name: Black OX
description: Black OX is a roguelike deckbuilder where Blackjack meets Tic-Tac-Toe in a wild, tactical clash of cunning combos. Stack cards, twist values, and unleash powerful Oxchips to outsmart your opponent—and flip the game on its head. This isn’t just Blackjack. This is Black OX.

name: Game Shop Simulator
description: Game Shop Simulator is a chill first-person simulation where every detail of running a Game store comes alive. Create the ultimate video game store! where you sell video games, Consoles, or Gaming Notebooks, this game lets you live out your dream of running a thriving gaming business.

name: Humanity's Last Hope
description: A roguelike game with upgrades paths inspired by "Vampire Survivors" and "Seraph's Last Stand". Build your own upgrade build, buy new hats and weapons, combine them and break the game!

name: Orange Life
description: Step into the bittersweet chaos of Orange Life — a narrative-driven game where every choice matters and nothing is quite what it seems

name: Pursuit Rampage
categories: Single-player;Steam Achievements;Keyboard Only Option;Mouse Only Option;Steam Cloud;Family Sharing
description: Drive, chase, and arrest across 40 missions in five regions—🏖️ beach, 🌆 city, 🏜️ desert, 🌲 forest, and 🏘️ suburban highways—by ☀️ day, 🌙 night, or 🌧️ rain.

name: Supermarket Billionaire
description: Who doesn't love supermarkets? Build your own empire! Improve your business, hire employees, optimize your facilities... and, most importantly, sell to become a billionaire!

name: Crown of Lust [18+] 👑
description: Outsmart nobles, steal their gold, and seduce your way to freedom! Crown of Lust 👑 is a spicy 18+ visual novel where brains beat swords and every choice leads to new pleasures — or fresh trouble. Your dirty rise to glory starts now!

name: The Podcaster
description: 🎙️ The Podcaster is a simulator where you manage your schedule, interview guests, and expand and customize your studio. Use topic cards to spark conversations and guide unique interviews. Grow your channel and rise to the top of the podcasting world!

name: Barfy's Adventure
categories: Single-player;Camera Comfort;Color Alternatives;Custom Volume Controls;Stereo Sound;Includes level editor
description: Barfy's Adventure is a fast-paced platformer about collecting gears, dashing through enemies, switching gravity, and so much more!

name: Fireside Feelings Soundtrack
description: Fireside Feelings — Original Soundtrack

name: DDD - Drone Drop Dash
description: A memory-based drone delivery game where every route counts. Rise to the top pilot.

name: Astropark
description: Astropark is a single-player VR game where you explore the Solar System through interactive, science-based missions. Adjust gravity, launch rockets, and discover real planets in a fun, educational, and non-violent space adventure.

name: Late-Night Ramen
categories: Single-player;Steam Achievements;Adjustable Text Size;Camera Comfort;Color Alternatives;Custom Volume Controls;Mouse Only Option;Playable without Timed Input;Save Anytime;Steam Cloud;Family Sharing

description: "A fascinating story 2" is coming! This time, "I" can finally live in a mansion, drive a luxury car, and date beautiful women... This is an adult visual novel game, so you must not only manage the company, but also manage the "lust" of several sexy beauties!

categories: Single-player;Adjustable Text Size;Custom Volume Controls;Keyboard Only Option;Mouse Only Option;Playable without Timed Input;Save Anytime;Stereo Sound;Subtitle Options;Touch Only Option;Family Sharing
description: 在《渣男游戏》里，你是一名年少多金的大帅哥，你会遇到许多性格迥异的美女，在与她们的相处过程中，是用渣男手段讨她们的欢心，还是用真诚得到她们的真爱，选择权在你手里。

name: Deer Hero
categories: Single-player;Steam Achievements;Full controller support;Steam Cloud;Family Sharing
description: "Deer Hero" is a 2D chaos-and-death action game. Guide the deer hero, Ererere, as you dodge bullet hell, wield diverse weapons, and master skills to bring an end to the war!

name: PUNCH CHAMPS Demo

description: Punch Champs is a fast-paced 2D brawler where every move counts. Master one-hit KOs, parries, and power-ups in chaotic local multiplayer matches. Outsmart rivals and fight your way to GOAT status. Best played with a controller!

name: Aeoliada
description: 3D Action RPG set in a mix of Ancient Greece and 80s Synthwave about a demigoddess queen cancelling her enemies with high kicks, a katana and a greatsword.

name: Stories of Somnia
categories: Single-player;Full controller support;Custom Volume Controls;Stereo Sound;Family Sharing

Navigate a dangerous, interconnected world and confront the unpredictable behavior of Rootbranch's residents.

description: This is an indie-developed zombie arcade shooter with a twist on arcade gameplay! Players can defeat zombies and use dropped weapons and power-ups to defeat more enemies as the difficulty increases.

description: 《审判者》是一款由金牌编剧冷小张打造的交互式解谜推理影游。《人民的名义》演员黄俊鹏×张志坚化身刑警双雄，携手破解“不可能犯罪”谜局，多米诺骨牌效应引发后续案件环环相扣。密室推演、疑犯审讯、舆论审判、多线结局，影视级沉浸，解构人性困局。喜欢本格及社会派推理的玩家不可错过的悬疑推理罪案刑侦游戏。

name: EX EZ
description: EX EZ is an intuitive XR virtual production solution that runs smoothly even on gaming-laptop-level hardware, enabling anyone to easily and quickly create high-quality virtual content.

name: Celephaïs Dead Cities
description: Multiplayer survival game in a long dead world.Explore the sunken horrors in your sea vessel while carefully choosing where to anchor and explore the wasteland on foot... NO NPC, All encountered survivors are other players. No leveling, no grinding, just PVP, PVE, with looter and survival elements.

description: You play as a boy drawn into a disturbing mystery surrounding a series of disappearances in his neighbourhood. Driven by a need to prove himself, he sets out to investigate — not by chasing danger, but by studying it, recreating it, and placing himself at the centre of it.

Use physical interactions, magical projectiles, and object-swapping to unlock paths, reflect lasers, activate platforms, break obstacles, and explore ancient ruins.

name: The Wake
categories: Single-player;Full controller support;Custom Volume Controls;Keyboard Only Option;Playable without Timed Input;Save Anytime;Stereo Sound;Family Sharing
description: The Wake is a Lovecraftian Fishing Adventure where you explore a forgotten island chain. Catch strange fish with customizable gear and learn to wield eldritch magic. Fend off abyssal beasts with powerful weapons, all while sailing the dark waters of an open world.

name: Cuisine Master VR
description: Cuisine Master is a virtual reality cooking game set in a high-end restaurant, where players prepare and serve dishes from five global cuisines: French, Italian, Middle Eastern, Mexican, and Chinese.

name: Scooter Slayer
description: Scooter Slayer is a musical racing rhythm arcade game that turns your or built-in songs into a unique track, the shape of which, as well as the speed of your car, will depend on the selected song.
